snippet.title: Real World Racing - Official Trailer HD
snippet.description:
REAL WORLD RACING is an innovative top-down racing game that lets you race through some of the world's greatest cities!

Planned to be out for PC on Q4 2012.

Check the latest news on the official website:

www.realworldracing.com

Like us on Facebook!

http://www.facebook.com/pages/RWR-Real-World-Racing/329355223823395

Greenlight page:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=94564971&searchtext=real+world+racing

1st Gear released! Check video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZksTw20fMnQ&feature=plcp

2nd Gear released! Check video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BOhpz9h3EWg&feature=plcp&noredirect=1
